Master Answer:
ImmunizeBC does not have specific information about setting up workplace immunization programs. However, travel health clinics and your local pharmacies may be able to provide this service.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: Work Safe BC has recommended that all employees in our workplace should get a Hepatitis B Vaccine. Is there a program available to have someone come to our workplace to immunize?
